          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Presens eller imperfekt?</string>
            <string language="en">Present or imperfect?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschenk oder unvollständiges?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présent ou imparfait ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Presente ou imperfeito?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presente o imperfetto?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρόν ή ατελής;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Presente o imperfecto?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här gäller det att välja rätt form av verbet, presens eller imperfekt?Modul 3 - Hur mår du? - Grammatik 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here is to choose the correct form of the verb, present tense or imperfect? Module 3 - How are you? - Grammar 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist hier, das korrekte Formular des Verbs zu wählen, 
Gegenwart oder unvollständig? Modul 3 - Wie geht es 
Ihnen? - Grammatik 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici choisir la forme correcte du verbe, le présent ou 
imparfait ? Module 3 - Comment allez-vous ? - 
grammaire 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Está aqui escolher o formulário correto do verbo, o 
tempo ou imperfeito atual? Módulo 3 - Como é você? 
- gramática 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui è scegliere la forma corretta del verbo, presente o 
imperfetto? Modulo 3 - Come siete? - grammatica 3. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ είναι να επιλέξει τη σωστή μορφή του ρήματος, 
παρών χρόνος ή ατελής; Ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε; - 
Γραμματική 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí está elegir la forma correcta del verbo, el 
presente o imperfecto? Módulo 3 - ¿Cómo es usted? 
- gramática 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
